channel.title: NCP's are not moving?

item.title: NCP's are not moving?
item.dc:creator: @walkineagle walkineagle
item.description:
@walkineagle wrote:

I tried it on another source, a non-blank one where NPC’s where walking around, added my code and my guy still didn’t walk.

Read full topic

item.title: NCP's are not moving?
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

try it with a diffrent npc, if it still doesnt work make sure its importing the autospawn.cfg folder correctly. To do this Search for autospawn or whatever abreviation it might have in your source, and make sure its importing the entire walking file.

Read full topic

item.title: NCP's are not moving?
item.dc:creator: @walkineagle walkineagle
item.description:
@walkineagle wrote:

//------NpcID—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption
spawn = 1 3236 3226 0 3239 3223 3233 3229 1 man

I spawn this NPC, and he’s supposed to wait around a 3 block radius or so, but he just stands still! Even after I attack him! It’s very annoying.

On a side note: How can you change whether or not an NPC is attackable?

Read full topic
